sentence: Some are nuisance candidates, but others are serious, such as GOP district chair Michele Woodhouse and Chuck Edwards, a state senator who represents a significant chunk of the new seat.
title: Opinion: Madison Cawthorn is in trouble. And it's entirely his own fault.

sentence: GOP Sen. Thom Tillis plans to appear as a special guest? at a fundraiser slated for next week benefiting Chuck Edwards, a primary challenger of embattled North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, according to an invitation sent to potential donors in the lobbying sector.
author: Kate Ackley
title: GOP senators, lobbyists aid challengers to lightning rod House members
